name: Mini Blue Raptor Hatchling
description:
Juvenile Elonian raptors rely more on cuteness than leaping ability.
Combine 2 Blue and 1 Green Raptor with 4 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Red.
Combine 1 Blue and 2 Green Raptors with 4 Unidentifed Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Yellow.
